title: When people are clearly violating the use of handicap plates/sticker on their vehicle - whom can we report the violators to? Some parking lots have limited handicap parking - all too often you see people that clearly are not handicap (sprinting into store when its raining, playing 18 rounds of golf on a hot summer afternoon without a cart). The people that are truly handicapped need those spaces.
text:
You
can report the violation to local law enforcement in your community.



Here's a link to information about handicap parking in Wilmington,
along with requirements for obtaining a permit.
